name: discord-interactions
description: A modern Discord bot framework built with Elysia and TypeScript for Cloudflare Workers
author: Faint

scripts.deploy: bun run generate-manifest && wrangler deploy --minify src/index.ts
scripts.deploy:check: echo '⚠️  Before deploying: Make sure all new handlers are added to src/lib/discord/manifest.ts' && echo 'See DEPLOYMENT.md for details' && wrangler deploy --minify src/index.ts
